faq.question: Can Notion AI summarize PDFs?
faq.answer: Notion AI can summarize content on Notion pages, but it doesn't have native PDF upload or specialized PDF parsing. You need to manually embed PDFs in pages first, and it lacks citation extraction and batch processing.

faq.question: Can I export SummarizePDF summaries to Notion?
faq.answer: Yes! SummarizePDF exports to Markdown format, which imports perfectly into Notion. Many users use SummarizePDF for PDF processing, then organize results in Notion.

faq.question: Which is more cost-effective for PDF work?
faq.answer: SummarizePDF is more cost-effective for PDF-heavy workflows. Notion AI requires both the base subscription AND the AI add-on, while SummarizePDF includes all AI features in one price.

faq.question: Can I replace Notion with SummarizePDF?
faq.answer: No - they serve different purposes. Notion is a comprehensive workspace for notes and collaboration. SummarizePDF is specialized for PDF summarization. Many users use both together.
